item.title: Helldivers film to premiere on November 10, 2027, star Jason Momoa
item.content:encoded:
• PlayStation

Release date set.

The Helldivers film announced in January 2025 will hit theaters on November 10, 2027, PlayStation Productions and Sony Pictures announced. Jason Momoa will star in the adaptation.

The film is produced by Hutch Parker, PlayStation Productionsâ€™ Asad Qizilbash, and Justin Lin, through his company Perfect Storm Entertainment.

Helldivers II is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PC via Steam.

Thanks, Deadline.
